body:
Alright... that took forever'

On topic: The other day me and cole (Cole1crc) faught on Badlion for my 1v1 series... He recorded as well so check his channel, for his video..
But i think this turned out great for a 1v1 video... (yes he is an avicus member :P* For any mods out dere -.-*) So i hope you enjoy! My intro is still iffy so Ill make another one maybe :P

Anyways here is the vid: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=un2Tmrn-1NQ&feature=youtu.be
Check out Cole!: www.youtube.com/ColecrcCave :)

If you want to apply for a 1v1 please visit this: http://avicus.net/forums/d46c99c06
 

Enyoy! ^.^
*Btw i highly recommend you subscribe to my channel, I will be doing daily uploads and i dont want to spam the forums :P*
